alert.note: Alert for Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 12 at 4:23AM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Wood River Foothills, including but not limited to Hailey, Bellevue, and Picabo. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 5 AM MST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
